price: Ne deε εwͻ asaase so nyinaa na afei wanya ne ho (afri asotwee no mu).
arabic: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma yunjīhi
